meanings.definition: A board at the head of a bed, often used for decorative or functional purposes.
meanings.sent1: The headboard of the bed was beautifully carved with intricate designs.
meanings.sent2: She leaned against the headboard while reading her favorite book.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat thought the headboard was a perfect scratching post.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a headboard of memories, each one etched into the wood of his thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The headboard stood tall, a sentinel at the head of the bed.

meanings.definition: The part of a bed frame that is attached to the head of the bed.
meanings.sent1: The headboard of the bed was made of sturdy oak.
meanings.sent2: She bumped her head on the headboard when she sat up too quickly.
meanings.sent3: The headboard seemed to have a mind of its own, creaking and groaning at night.
meanings.sent4: His determination was as solid as the headboard, unyielding in the face of challenges.
meanings.sent5: The headboard loomed over the room, a silent guardian of dreams.
